com.microsoft.azure.management.dns

Class ZoneOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.dns.ZoneOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZoneOperations, ServiceOperations<DnsManagementClientImpl>

    public class ZoneOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<DnsManagementClientImpl>, ZoneOperations
    Operations for managing DNS zones.
